amendment.description: An amendment numbered 62 printed in Part B of House Report 118-261 to reduce the salary of Ann E. Carlson, Acting Administrator of the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration, to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A032) Failed by recorded vote: 164 - 264 (Roll no. 617).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A032) Failed by recorded vote: 164 - 264 (Roll no. 617).
